error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'comic_book_cost' (value: 6) was used instead of 'total_money_from_cards' (value: 100.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 94
Arthur makes 100 because 0.05 x 2000 = <<0.05*2000=100>>100
Arthur can buy 1 comic books because 6 / 6= 1
The comic books cost $6 because 1 x 6 = <<1*6=6>>6
He has $94 leftover because 100 - 6 = <<100-6=94>>94
